docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is stable and recommended for use. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or using api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/auth_source_ldaps/980190962
200
{
  "id": 980190962,
  "type": "AuthSourceLdap",
  "name": "ldap-server",
  "port": 123,
  "account": null,
  "base_dn": "dn=x,dn=y",
  "ldap_filter": null,
  "attr_login": "uid",
  "attr_firstname": "givenName",
  "attr_lastname": "sn",
  "attr_mail": "mail",
  "attr_photo": null,
  "onthefly_register": true,
  "tls": true,
  "created_at": "2014-07-23T13:30:50Z",
  "updated_at": "2014-07-23T13:30:50Z"
}
